column5: Just wondering if water is high, low, or normal pool? Saw a recent video and it looked low.
Normal for this time of year. Left Hudson Fri am after week on houseboat. Water level same as other years. Able to go thru both shortcuts out of Hudson going north.
Here is a site that is helpfulwww.lwcb.ca/waterflowdata.html
Thanks guys...trip is several weeks away and was just curious.
